abstract: Heath Ceramics are beautiful. Alabama Chanin textiles are beautiful. But could the twain meet?
snippet: Heath Ceramics are beautiful. Alabama Chanin textiles are beautiful. But could the twain meet?
lead_paragraph: Two great tastes don't always taste great together. The same can be true for design collaborations. Heath Ceramics are beautiful. Alabama Chanin textiles are beautiful. Their respective designers, Catherine Bailey and Natalie Chanin, are friends. But could the twain meet?
